fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Wife of the companion Abu ad-Dardāʾ. She was a scholar, jurist, and teacher based in Damascus and Jerusalem.
Companion of the Prophet ﷺ and husband of Umm ad-Dardāʿ

fullname: Ṣafwān ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Ṣafwān ibn Umayyah ibn Khalaf
searchname: Safwan ibn Abdullah ibn Safwan ibn Umayyah ibn Khalaf

fullname: Muḥammad ibn Muslim ibn ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Shihāb al-Zuhri
searchname: Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Shihab al-Zuhri

info: 8th century jurist, author, ascetic, and hafiẓ
